amendment.description: Amendment ensures that Department of Agriculture certificates of origin are accepted by any country that has entered into a free trade agreement with the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to ensure that Department of Agriculture certificates of origin are accepted by any country that has entered into a free trade agreement with the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
